title: Oil Companies and Venezuela's Big Oil Plan
summary: President Trump met with oil company leaders at the White House to talk about a plan for American companies to help Venezuela with its oil. Venezuela has the most oil in the world, but it only produces a little bit right now. The plan is for companies to spend a lot of money, like $100 billion, to fix Venezuela's oil equipment and systems. In return, the U.S. will start using and selling some of Venezuela's oil. The president promised to keep everything safe. An expert named Bob McNally, who knows a lot about energy, joined to explain more about what might happen next with this plan.

keywords.explanation: a black liquid found underground that is used to make fuel and other products
a country in South America that has a lot of oil
an idea or set of steps to do something, like helping with oil
businesses that work together to make or sell things
coins and bills used to buy things, like $100 billion

questions.question: Who met at the White House to talk about oil?
Which country has the most oil in the world?
How much money might companies spend to help Venezuela?
What did the president promise to provide?
What will the U.S. do with Venezuela's oil?

background_read: Oil is an important resource used for energy in cars and homes. Venezuela is a country with a lot of oil, but it has problems producing it. Companies are groups that work on big projects, like fixing oil equipment. When leaders make plans, they try to help countries work together. Experts like Bob McNally study energy to give advice on such plans.
Article_Structure: WHO: President Trump, oil executives, and Bob McNally
WHAT: A plan for American companies to spend money to fix Venezuela's oil systems and for the U.S. to use its oil
WHERE: White House in the United States and Venezuela
WHY: To help Venezuela produce more oil and for the U.S. to benefit from it

perspectives.description: Some people think the plan is good because it can help Venezuela fix its oil problems and create jobs.
